Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™ Cyclosporine (CSA) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Cyclosporine (CSA) Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista Cyclosporine (CSA) Flex reagent cartridge intended for quantitative measurement of cyclosporine A in whole blood on Dimension Vista system
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of cyclosporine concentrations in whole blood as an aid in management of heart, liver, and kidney transplant patients receiving cyclosporine therapy
